languages.text: "Дорог{mf|ой|ая} Фиделио, неужели вы уже уходите? И не дождетесь, как мы отправим батюшку в топку, то есть — в последний путь?"
"My dear Fidelio, leaving already? And you won't even stay to see the old man burn — I mean, laid to rest?"
languages.original_text: "Дорог{mf|ой|ая} Фиделио, неужели вы уже уходите? И не дождетесь, как мы отправим батюшку в топку, то есть — в последний путь?"

traits.locale_text: "My dear Fidelio, leaving already? And you won't even stay to see Papa burn, I mean laid to rest?"
"My dear Fidelio, leaving already? And you won't even stay to see Papa burn, I mean laid to rest?"
"My dear Fidelio, leaving already? And you won't even stay to see the old man burn — I mean, laid to rest?"
"My dear Fidelio, leaving already? And you won't even stay to see the old man burn — I mean, laid to rest?"
"My dear Fidelio, leaving already? And you won't even stay to see the old man burn — I mean, laid to rest?"

languages.text: “你这就要走了吗，我亲爱的菲迪奥？你甚至不愿意留下来，看那个老头子被烧得尸骨无存……我是说，看着他安息？”
languages.original_text: "My dear Fidelio, leaving already? And you won't even stay to see the old man burn — I mean, laid to rest?"

traits.locale_text: “你这就要走了吗，我亲爱的菲迪奥？你甚至不愿意留下来，看那个老头子被烧得尸骨无存……我是说，看着他安息？”

languages.text: «Mi querid{mf|o|a} Fidelio, ¿ya se marcha? ¿No se quedará a ver al viejo arder... perdón, descansar eternamente?».
languages.original_text: "My dear Fidelio, leaving already? And you won't even stay to see the old man burn — I mean, laid to rest?"

traits.locale_text: «Mi querid{mf|o|a} Fidelio, ¿ya se marcha? ¿No se quedará a ver al viejo arder... perdón, descansar eternamente?».

languages.text: 「フィデリオ、もう行くのか？あいつが焼け…いや、正式にあの世に行くのを見届けないのか？」
languages.original_text: "My dear Fidelio, leaving already? And you won't even stay to see the old man burn — I mean, laid to rest?"

traits.locale_text: 「フィデリオ、もう行くのか？あいつが焼け…いや、正式にあの世に行くのを見届けないのか？」

languages.text: "{mf|Mein lieber|Meine liebe} Fidelio, Ihr geht schon? Und Ihr wollt Euch nicht mal ansehen, wie der alte Mann verbrannt – will sagen, der ewigen Ruhe übergeben wird?"
languages.original_text: "My dear Fidelio, leaving already? And you won't even stay to see the old man burn — I mean, laid to rest?"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Mein lieber|Meine liebe} Fidelio, Ihr geht schon? Und Ihr wollt Euch nicht mal ansehen, wie der alte Mann verbrannt – will sagen, der ewigen Ruhe übergeben wird?"

languages.text: « {mf|Cher|Chère} Fidélio, vous nous quittez déjà ? Vous ne resterez donc pas avec nous pour voir le vieux cram... je veux dire, se faire incinérer ? »
languages.original_text: "My dear Fidelio, leaving already? And you won't even stay to see the old man burn — I mean, laid to rest?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Cher|Chère} Fidélio, vous nous quittez déjà ? Vous ne resterez donc pas avec nous pour voir le vieux cram... je veux dire, se faire incinérer ? »

languages.text: "Hemen mi gidiyorsunuz Fidelio {mf|Bey|Hanım}? İhtiyarın yanmasını... Şey, yani son yolculuğuna uğurlanmasını beklemeyecek misiniz?"
languages.original_text: "My dear Fidelio, leaving already? And you won't even stay to see the old man burn — I mean, laid to rest?"

traits.locale_text: "Hemen gidiyor musun sevgili Fidelio? İhtiyarın yakılmasını, yani son yolculuğuna uğurlanmasını beklemeyecek misin?"
